thig5.11:1.4_0: they pay money to the penniless.
thig5.11:2.4_0: sit in a discreet place to meditate.
thig5.11:3.4_0: and retired to a discreet place.
thig5.11:4.1_0: In the middle of the night,
thig5.11:4.3_0: In the middle watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.5_0: In the last watch of the night,
thig5.11:4.6_0: they shattered the mass of darkness.
thig5.11:5.1_0: They rose and paid homage at her feet:
thig5.11:5.4_0: as the thirty gods honor Indra,
thig5.11:5.6_0: Masters of the three knowledges, we are free of defilements.”
thig5.11:6.1_0: That is how thirty senior nuns declared their enlightenment in the presence of Paṭācārā.
